result.title: [HackerRank] Sprint-Debug on 29th of August.
result.content:
Hello CodeForces Community!

I am glad to share that HackerRank's Sprint-Debug is scheduled on 29th-August-2015 at 16:30 UTC

Go ahead and register now at https://www.hackerrank.com/sprint-debug to show off your debugging skills.

Contest will be unrated and will consists of 7 problems which needs to be debugged.The scoring is 20 — 20 — 20 — 40 — 40 — 60 — 100. Tiebreaker is person to reach the score first.

The top 10 contestants will get a cool HackerRank T-Shirt.

Good luck and have fun.
